annotations: *+ years’ military personnel with experience of leading and executing commander’s intent through organization of planning, delegating, maintaining and supervising to ensure the highest success rate. Possess a high school diploma and excelled in a multitude of extracurricular activities that involves’ teamwork.
United States Marine Corps – Camp Lejeune, NC June 2018 – June 2022
•Was put in a position to obtain a large amount of knowledge and make sure my co-workers are able to retain the same knowledge to successfully complete the task at hand.
•Executing orders that were given to me by my senior leaders
•Tasked to account for a platoon worth of marines
•Organized training schedules and led physical training
•Maintained cleanliness of our crew’s work space
•Took orders from customers and made sure they were happy with their meals
•Greeting customers as well as taking orders from customers and informing my crew members
•Entrusted to work night shifts to ensure that the work space was correctly cleaned and closed for the morning crew
•Handled money and numbers to ensure that the correct amount of money made was also double accounted for and given to our manager
United Way of Onslow County (Month YYYY – Month YYYY)
Assisted staff in the development of the volunteer training program
In my latest job as a marine I have been promoted 3 times. I have also received 2 appreciation letters for putting in extra hours to help benefit our organization, as well as our men and women.
